author: billbarker
msg: Change B2C to only add up to the limit on the CB, and use the sinks to the BC to request all data.

author: billbarker
msg: Use char counts and callbacks for determining marks.
This will now read exactly to the end of the mark if over the default 8Kb, and the reset it on the next read over the mark.

author: dims
msg: ability to deploy snapshots to the apache snapshots repo

author: cam
msg: Fixed parsing of pseudo-elements (which were being ignored).
